titles.title: Strengthening the Department of Homeland Security Secure Mail Initiative Act
Strengthening the Department of Homeland Security Secure Mail Initiative Act

A bill to direct the Secretary of Homeland Security to provide for an option under the Secure Mail Initiative under which a person to whom a document is sent under that initiative may elect to have the United States Postal Service use the Hold for Pickup service or the Signature Confirmation service in delivering the document, and for other purposes.
Strengthening the Department of Homeland Security Secure Mail Initiative Act
